column8: 相位通讯：库姆·失去言语

<Title:简介>
弗朗西斯饲喂的「宠物」。
本是名为「丽莎」的活泼少女，经雕塑家协会的改造转变为人兽缝合的扭曲形态，后被莉莉收养，暂时生活在疯人院内。
尽管丧失了人类的外貌和发声能力，库姆仍保留着丽莎的部分心智，能够通过简单的肢体动作传达自己的意图。
她做出了自己的选择。
column9:
Francis's "pet."
Originally a lively Maiden named "Lisa," she was transformed by the Sculptors' Association into a Distorted human-animal hybrid, and later adopted by Lily, temporarily living within the asylum.
Despite losing her human appearance and ability to speak, Koum retains part of Lisa's mind, capable of conveying her intention through simple physical gestures.
She has made her own choice.
